data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Mapserver is a geodata publishing tool provided by the University
    of Minnesota (http://mapserver.gis.umn.edu). Geo::UMNmap::cgiserver
    pre-/postprocesses data given to and read from this mapserver. It is
    the www part of a bunch of modules which amongst other things deal
    with the preparation of ArcView (TM ESRI) views for publishing with
    the mapserver, visualisation of ArcView map view definitions etc. As
    all modules primarily work with geographical data, I suggest to put
    them in the Geo:: namespace
